import React, {Component} from 'react'; class ToDo extends Component { state={ data:[ {id:1,name:"NodeJs and express", status:true}, {id:1,name:"NodeJs and express", status:true}, {id:1,name:"NodeJs and express", status:true}, {id:1,name:"NodeJs and express", status:true}, {id:1,name:"NodeJs and express", status:false}, ] }; render() { return (

To Do List App

{this.state.data.map( d => )}
{d.name}
Total Task: {this.state.data.length}
Complate Task: {this.state.data.find( d => d.status === false ).length}
); } } export default ToDo;
